abstract: Aden Haji Hussein, legislator from Puntland region, Somalia, is gunned down outside Mogadishu hospital where he had taken his wife; Shabab spokesman claims the Somali Islamist group is responsible.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen from the Shabab killed Aden Haji Hussein, a regional lawmaker, on Saturday in the capital, Mogadishu, officials said.
snippet: Gunmen from the Shabab killed Aden Haji Hussein, a regional lawmaker, on Saturday in the capital, Mogadishu, officials said.
